trans-unit.source: {R}: CARDNAME gets +1/+0 until end of turn. If this ability is played four or more times during this turn, sacrifice CARDNAME at end of turn.
trans-unit.target: {R}: CARDNAME gets +1/+0 until end of turn. If this ability is played four or more times during this turn, sacrifice CARDNAME at end of turn.

trans-unit.source: These small but intelligent Dragons and their Olesian allies held back the tide of Pashalik Mons's hordes of Goblin Raiders.\n*DragonCon 1994*
